root.name: SingStar: Vol. 2
root.description: Tracklist Aerosmith - Dude Looks Like A Lady Blur - Country House Bobby Brown - My Perogative The Cure - Pictures Of You Eminem - Without Me George Michael - Freedom 90 Gorillaz - Dare Gossip - Standing In The Way Of Control Hot Chocolate - You Sexy Thing Joe Cocker - Summer In The City Kaiser Chiefs - Ruby The Killers - When You Were Young Kool and The Gang - Celebration The Libertines - Can't Stand Me Now Maximo Park - Our Velocity Morrissey - Suedehead Nirvana - Lithium The Offspring - Pretty Fly (For A White Guy) Panic! At The Disco - But It's Better If You Do Paul McCartney and The Frog Chorus - We All Stand Together Police - Don't Stand So Close To Me The Proclaimers - I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles) Pulp - Common People Radiohead - Street Spirit (Fade Out) Shakespeare's Sister - Stay Spandau Ballet - True Suede - Metal Mickey Tom Jones with Mousse T - Sexbomb Tone Loc - Funky Cold Medina Young MC - Bust A Move
